home.heroDescription: Empowering early-stage innovation in AI, Mobile, and Games.
home.focusDescription: We invest in breakthrough technologies that are reshaping industries and creating new possibilities.
home.focusAIDesc: Next-generation artificial intelligence solutions that enhance human capabilities and automate complex processes.
home.focusMobileDesc: Revolutionary mobile experiences that connect billions of users worldwide through intuitive interfaces.
home.focusGamingDesc: Immersive gaming experiences that push the boundaries of entertainment and social interaction.
home.impactDescription: Supporting founders from seed to pre-Series A with capital, expertise, and networks.
home.ctaDescription: Join our portfolio of innovative founders who are shaping the future of AI, mobile, and gaming.

about.heroDescription: Global Wise Investments is a venture capital firm focused on investment opportunities in AI applications, mobile products, and gaming.
about.missionDescription: Our mission is to create positive economic impact and long-term value for all stakeholders — including our investors, portfolio companies, and the broader community.
about.missionDetail: We bring deep expertise and broad networks in the mobile internet industry.
about.approachDescription: We invest in promising early-stage companies — from seed to pre-Series A — that are building breakthrough technologies and products.
about.focusDescription: We specialize in three key areas that are transforming the digital landscape and creating new opportunities for innovation.
about.focusAIDesc: Supporting artificial intelligence solutions that enhance productivity, automate processes, and create new possibilities across industries.
about.focusMobileDesc: Investing in innovative mobile applications and platforms that connect users and transform digital experiences.
about.focusGamingDesc: Backing next-generation gaming experiences and interactive entertainment that push creative boundaries.
about.foundryDescription: We also collaborate with top-tier marketing partners to run a specialized founder-first incubator that supports product/tech-driven startups with capital, resources, and go-to-market expertise.
about.foundryDetail: GWI Foundry is our incubation program designed for product-focused founders. We offer early capital, strategic guidance, and growth support in partnership with top marketing firms.

contact.heroDescription: Whether you're a founder with a bold vision or an investor looking to partner with us, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.formMessagePlaceholder: Tell us about your company, vision, and how we can help...
contact.ctaDescription: Join our portfolio of exceptional companies and gain access to our global network, strategic expertise, and unwavering support.

portfolio.heroDescription: We're proud to partner with exceptional companies that are transforming industries and creating lasting impact across global markets.
portfolio.successDescription: Celebrating the achievements of our portfolio companies and the impact they're making in their respective industries.
portfolio.stat1Label: Average return multiple across successful exits
portfolio.stat3Label: IPOs and strategic acquisitions to date

team.heroDescription: World-class investors and operators with deep expertise across technology, healthcare, and emerging markets. United by a shared passion for building the future.
team.joinDescription: We're always looking for exceptional talent to join our mission of building the future. If you're passionate about innovation and want to work with world-class entrepreneurs, we'd love to hear from you.

incubator.heroDescription: GWI Foundry is our incubation program designed for product-focused founders.
incubator.heroDetail: We offer early capital, strategic guidance, and growth support in partnership with top marketing firms.
incubator.overviewDescription: GWI Foundry bridges the gap between innovative ideas and market success through our comprehensive incubation program.
incubator.overviewDetail: We collaborate with top-tier marketing partners to provide founders with not just capital, but the strategic expertise and resources needed to build breakthrough products and scale effectively.
incubator.offerDescription: Comprehensive support designed to accelerate your journey from concept to market success.
incubator.capitalDesc: Early-stage funding to fuel product development and initial market validation, with follow-on support for growth.
incubator.mentorshipDesc: Access to experienced founders, industry experts, and technical advisors who guide product and business strategy.
incubator.marketingDesc: Partnership with top marketing firms to develop and execute go-to-market strategies that drive user acquisition.
incubator.productDesc: Technical guidance and resources to build robust, scalable products that meet market demands.
incubator.networkDesc: Connection to our extensive network of investors, partners, customers, and industry leaders.
incubator.scalingDesc: Operational guidance and resources to help startups scale efficiently and sustainably.
incubator.processDescription: Ready to transform your innovative idea into a market-leading product? Apply to join our next cohort.
incubator.step1Desc: Submit your application with product vision and team details
incubator.step2Desc: Our team evaluates your application and market potential
incubator.step3Desc: Meet with our partners to discuss your vision and goals
incubator.step4Desc: Join the program and begin your accelerated growth journey
incubator.ctaDescription: Join a community of innovative founders who are creating breakthrough products in AI, mobile, and gaming. Together, we're shaping the future of technology.

footer.tagline: Backing Builders of the Future. We invest in promising early-stage companies in AI applications, mobile products, and gaming.
